group_1.textCenter: (If they keep this up, something terrible@is going to happen!)
(I've got to try and stop them! I have to@do something!)
Do the two of you really have to fight?

group_1.textLeft: We gotta settle who the toughest@Magical Girl is, once and for all!

group_1.textRight: But that's really dangerous! What happens@if you get hurt?!

group_1.textLeft: Who cares? I've got a score to settle!

group_1.textRight: I can't stand the thought of losin' to@Felicia!

group_1.textLeft: I'm not gonna lose to you either, Ayame!
(The way they compete...)
(It reminds me of a book I read,@where wild animals fight over territory.)
[chara:301101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock](A-ah! Now isn't the time to think about@books!)
E-excuse... Excuse me!
S-sorry!
But, u-um... Instead of having an actual@fight, um...
How about you, uh, try competing in some@other way?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, how else can we figure out who the@strongest is?

group_1.textLeft: W-well, um, let me see...
[chara:301101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301101:cheek_0][chara:301101:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:301101:lipSynch_1]You could, um, do anything! F-for@instance, ah...
Maybe a tongue twister contest?

group_1.textRight: [chara:302801:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Huh? The heck kinda idea is that!

group_1.textLeft: Okay, so not that...
What about, um, who can memorize the@most ancient poetry?

group_1.textRight: How the heck does that tell us who the@the strongest is!

group_1.textLeft: My point is! What I'm trying to say is...
...you have to compete in a way that won't@get you hurt!
I don't want to see either of you get@injured.
Ah, I know, I know! How 'bout a game@where we blow up abandoned buildings?

group_1.textRight: Or we could try tossin' cars!
That, um, might be a bother to the@people around you, so...
Oh, I know! Why don't you face off in a@bunch of contests?
You can measure all your various strengths@as Magical Girls!

group_1.textLeft: Ooh, that's not half bad! It actually sounds@fun! Fun, fun, fun!
Yeah, I like that idea! Just don't pick@any challenges that'll piss me off!

group_1.textRight: (I-I did it! I got them to agree!)

group_1.textCenter: This sounds great! I'm already gettin'@all fired up!
